# Heyhido - Hidayat Heydarov's Blog

> Personal blog about productivity, learning, technology, AI, and self-improvement by Hidayat Heydarov.

## About
This is the personal website of Hidayat Heydarov, featuring blog posts on various topics including productivity, technology, AI, learning, and personal development.

- [Now](https://heyhido.com/now/)
